info.name: Inventory Management API - Complete
info.description: Complete API collection for Inventory Management System including all endpoints for Assets, Companies, Asset Types, Materials, Stock Areas, Inward, Material Requests, Material Allocation, Stock Transfers, Consumption, Person Stock, Returns, Reports, Stock Levels, Files, Audit, Notifications, Search, Bulk Operations, Export, Validation, Business Partners, Purchase Requests, and Purchase Orders. Admin-only routes are marked with [ADMIN ONLY]. Updated with latest endpoints including PR number generation, PO submission, document uploads, and additional export endpoints.

request.description: Check if inventory routes are working
Get assets with low stock (balance <= threshold)
Get dashboard statistics and analytics
Add new company (Admin only)
Add new asset type (Admin only)

body.raw:
{
  "materialName": "Fiber Patch Cord",
  "productCode": "FPC-001",
  "materialType": "COMPONENT",
  "uom": "PIECE(S)",
  "description": "Fiber patch cord for network connections"
}

request.description: Delete inward entry (Admin only)
Mark inward entry as completed and create inventory records (Admin only)
Approve or reject material request (Admin only)
Get available inventory items for allocation to a material request
Get all allocations for a material request
Allocate specific inventory items (serial numbers) to material request items
Cancel an allocation and return item to available stock
Get inventory items assigned to a technician (person stock)
Get person stock items for a specific ticket
Search for a specific serial number in person stock
Get items available for return from technician's person stock
Get all return records with filtering and pagination
Get single return record by ID
Create a new return record for items from person stock
Approve return and transfer items back to warehouse
Reject a return request
Export stock movement report to CSV/JSON (Admin only)
Export consumption analysis report to CSV/JSON (Admin only)
Export stock valuation report to CSV/JSON (Admin only)
Delete business partner (Admin only)

query.description: ISO date string (optional, defaults to today)

request.description: Generate PR number based on requested date in format PR-MONTH-YEAR-order
Submit purchase request (DRAFT -> SUBMITTED)
Approve purchase request (Admin only)
Reject purchase request (Admin only)
Delete purchase request (Admin only)
Create purchase order from purchase request

item.name: Mark Purchase Order as Sent [ADMIN ONLY]

request.description: Mark purchase order as SENT (DRAFT -> SENT) (Admin only)

item.name: Mark Purchase Order as Received [ADMIN ONLY]

request.description: Mark purchase order as RECEIVED (SENT -> RECEIVED) (Admin only)
Submit purchase order (sends email to vendor)
Add documents to purchase order
Delete purchase order (Admin only)
